message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you today. I think it would be perfect for your needs. I'm asking for $200, which is a very fair price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $200 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $120.
Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $200 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $170. This is my final offer.
I'm really interested in the product, but $170 is still too high for me. I'm willing to pay up to $130, but that's my final offer.
